channel.title: Visibility and Haze
channel.description: Updated Visibility and Haze content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: Public Informational Webinar: Final Regional Haze Rule Revisions
item.description:
Slides for the public informational webinar on the final Regional Haze Rule revisions (scheduled for January 26, 2017 at 12:30pm ET).

  • Webinar Slides - Final Regional Haze Rule Revisions (PDF)(20 pp, 104 K)
item.dc:creator: mbeaver

item.title: Webinar Announcement: Informational Public Webinar to Discuss the Final Regional Haze Rule Revisions
item.description:
EPA plans to hold an informational public webinar on Thursday, January 26, 2017 from 12:30-2:00pm EST. During this webinar, we will provide an overview of the final Regional Haze Rule revisions. There is no phone line; audio will be only via the webinar.

Webinar URL:   https://epawebconferencing.acms.com/reghazeamend

Regional Haze Rule Revisions Webinar Slides
item.dc:creator: mbeaver

item.title: Final Rulemaking: Amendments to Regulatory Requirements for State Regional Haze Plans
item.description:
December 14, 2016 - The EPA is finalizing revisions to requirements states must follow in preparing and submitting implementation plans and progress reports for visibility impairment.

Webinar Announcement

Final Rule - Federal Register - January 10, 2017

  • Fact Sheet (PDF)(4 pp, 190 K)
item.dc:creator: mbeaver

item.dc:creator: rcopland

item.title: Public Webinar on the Draft Guidance Document for the Second Implementation Period of the Regional Haze Rule
item.description:
Notice of Informational Public Webinar on the Draft Guidance Document for the Second Implementation Period of the Regional Haze Rule:

  • EPA held an informational public webinar on the Draft Guidance Document for the Second Implementation Period of the Regional Haze Rule on Wednesday, July 27, 2016
  • Audio recording of webinar
  • Webinar slides
item.dc:creator: aingram

item.title: Regional Haze Guidance Technical Support Document and Data File
item.description:
Section 5 of the Draft Guidance on Progress Tracking Metrics, Long-term Strategies, Reasonable Progress Goals and Other Requirements for Regional Haze State Implementation Plans for the Second Implementation Period includes references to a Technical Support Document (TSD) and a data file containing results for each IMPROVE monitor. This page contains these supporting documents and files.

  • RH TSD - Data File (XLSX)(1 pg, 16 MB)
  • RH Guidance TSD - Main Document (PDF)(97 pp, 8 MB)
  • RH Guidance TSD - Supplemental Information (PDF)(199 pp, 12 MB)
  • RH TSD - Data Dictionary (PDF)(3 pp, 169 K)
item.dc:creator: mbeaver

item.title: Draft Guidance for the Second Implementation Period of the Regional Haze Rule
item.description:
This draft guidance document was prepared by the EPA to assist states in developing and submitting regional haze State Implementation Plans for the second implementation period (2018-2028). This document is currently in draft form, and the EPA plans to finalize the guidance after the public comment period. The availability of this draft guidance and the details of the public comment period are announced in the Notice of Availability. A summary of the purpose and content of the document is given in the fact sheet.

  • Notice of Public Informational Webinar on the Draft Guidance for the Second Implementation Period of the Regional Haze Rule
  • Regional Haze Guidance Technical Support Document and Data File
  • Notice of Availability of Draft Guidance on Regional Haze (81 FR 44608)
  • Draft Guidance for the Second Implementation Period of the Regional Haze Rule (PDF)(248 pp, 3 MB)
  • Fact Sheet for Draft Regional Haze Guidance (PDF)(3 pp, 128 K)
item.dc:creator: mbeaver

item.title: Extension of Public Comment Period for Proposed RHR Revisions
item.description:
June 24, 2016 - Extension of public comment period for proposed Regional Haze Rule revisions. Comment period extended to August 10, 2016.

  • Extension of Public Comment Period for Proposed RHR Revisions (PDF)(2 pp, 100 K)
item.dc:creator: mbeaver

item.title: Regional Haze Denver Public Hearing - Registered Speakers
item.description:
June 1, 2016 - Pre-registered speakers for the June 1, 2016 public hearing on proposed revisions to the Regional Haze Rule.
